sentences.en: a sensible increase in temperature
sentences.cn: 温度的明显上升

sentences.en: Are you sensible of the dangers of your position?
sentences.cn: 你觉察到你处境中的危险了 吗 ?

sentences.en: Even sensible Frank had fallen under her spell.
sentences.cn: 甚至连一向理智的弗兰克都被她迷住了。

sentences.en: He was sensible enough to mind his own business.
sentences.cn: 他颇有见识,不去管闲事.

sentences.en: His advice was always sensible and his energy unbounded.
sentences.cn: 他的建议总是很明智，他的精力似乎永远也用不完。

sentences.en: In the state I was in, this seemed a perfectly sensible remark.
sentences.cn: 在我所处的情况下, 这么说看来是完全合乎情理的.

sentences.en: It was very sensible of you to bring your umbrella.
sentences.cn: 你带雨伞很明智.

sentences.en: It would seem more sensible to apply standards flexibly rather than rigidly.
sentences.cn: 灵活地运用标准比死守标准会显得更合情合理。

sentences.en: It’s sensible to keep a note of your passport number.
sentences.cn: 把你的护照号码记下来是明智的。

sentences.en: Let's sit down and have a calm and sensible talk.
sentences.cn: 让我们心平气和地坐下来谈一谈.

sentences.en: Moving house seemed like the sensible thing to do .
sentences.cn: 搬家似乎是明智的做法。

sentences.en: Moving house seemed like the sensible thing to do.
sentences.cn: 搬家似乎是明智的做法。

sentences.en: Oh come on, let's be sensible about this.
sentences.cn: 噢，得了吧，我们还是理智地对待此事吧。

sentences.en: Richard Dorrington was, in their eyes, a very sensible and reliable man.
sentences.cn: 在他们眼中，理查德·多林顿是个非常可靠的明白人。

sentences.en: sensible advice
sentences.cn: 合理的建议

sentences.en: She seems very sensible.
sentences.cn: 她好像很明智。

sentences.en: She's a sensible sort of person.
sentences.cn: 她属于那种通情达理的人。

sentences.en: Their ideas seem to be far more down to earth and sensible.
sentences.cn: 他们的想法貌似更务实也更合理。

sentences.en: They've turned sensible, if you take my meaning.
sentences.cn: 他们变得通情达理了，如果你明白我的意思的话。

sentences.en: We would view favourably any sensible suggestion for maintaining the business.
sentences.cn: 我们欢迎为维持业务稳定而提出的所有合理建议。

sentences.en: Wear loose clothing and sensible footwear.
sentences.cn: 穿上宽松的衣服和舒服的鞋子。

words.tran_cn: 愚蠢的；无知觉的；无意识的
敏感的；[仪] 灵敏的；感光的；易受伤害的
毫无知觉地；无意识地；不省人事地
明显地；容易感知地；聪明地
感觉，官能；观念；道理；理智
情感；敏感性；感觉；识别力

trans.tran_cn: 明智的，合理的，实用的，可意识到的
trans.tran_en: reasonable, practical, and showing good judgment

trans.tran_cn: 可感觉到的东西; 敏感的人;
